data_paragraph: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.
about_me_paragraph: As a proficient frontend developer, I specialize in HTML, CSS,JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, with extensive experience in version control using Git and GitHub. With a passion for crafting dynamic and responsive user interfaces, I bring creativity and technical expertise to every project I undertake. My portfolio showcases a diverse range of projects that demonstrate my skills and dedication to delivering high-quality web solutions.
service_text: Services with more than 1 years of experience providing quality work to clients and companies
service_1: Specializes in crafting compelling user interfaces
service_2: Experienced in developing dynamic and static web pages
service_3: Skilled in creating engaging UX element interactions
service_4: Expertise in effectively positioning company brands
service_5: Delivers high-quality designs and mockups for client satisfaction
A Selection Of Stuff I've Built: A Selection Of Stuff I've Built
techforge_pargraph: A responsive dashboard, built with Material-UI (MUI), featuring both dark and light modes. Utilizes libraries such as react-pro-sidebar and nivo charts. Form validation is implemented using Yup and Formik.
modern_bank_app_paragraph: Developed with React and Tailwind CSS, the Single Page Application (SPA) boasts a cutting-edge design, ensuring responsiveness across various devices. Embracing modern web development practices, the application offers a seamless user experience while harnessing the power of React's dynamic components and Tailwind CSS's utility-first approach to styling.
Netflix_Landig_page_UI_Clone_desc: The Netflix landing page UI, meticulously crafted using HTML and Tailwind CSS, exemplifies a harmonious blend of aesthetics and functionality. Tailored to adapt seamlessly to various devices, its responsive design ensures an optimal viewing experience across different screen sizes.
KayhanTech_desc: The website for Kayhan Tech's YouTube channel has been meticulously crafted using the versatile styling capabilities of Bootstrap. By leveraging Bootstrap's extensive framework, the website is not only aesthetically pleasing but also highly functional, with a layout that dynamically adjusts to different screen sizes and devices.
x_ui_clone_desc: X (Twitter) Landing page clone has been meticulously crafted using Tailwind CSS. This clone ensures full responsiveness across a wide range of devices, guaranteeing an optimal viewing experience regardless of screen size or device type.
DoDay_Online_Task_Tracker_desc: Built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS, this task tracker offers seamless task management. With local storage integration, users can efficiently store and access their tasks, enhancing productivity.
Name: Name
movieFlix_pargraph: I developed a dynamic movie collections web application using React, styled with Tailwind CSS, and managed state with Redux. The application integrates with the TMDb API to fetch movie data, allowing users to view movie details, ratings, and trailers. Features include dynamic banners with transition effects, a responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices, and reusable components for maintainability.
kayhantech_blog_paragraph: Developed a blog web application using ReactJS and TailwindCSS, with Appwrite for backend services and Redux for state management. Features include user authentication, post creation, viewing, updating, and deletion, enabling a seamless and interactive user experience.
